reviewtext: My system always sounded great and used to use RadioShack's gold cable's.  I got these cause they were here on amazon where I bought my new dvd player.  These cables are a lot more hefty than anything i've ever seen.  I didn't compare quality to any other cables so I don't know about sound quality but it does sound good.  If you're like me you probably want to spend more time infront of the tv than behind it.
summary: I don't hear a difference but these things are well built!
